title: Top Court Upholds Suspended Jail Term for Lotte Chief
text:
The Supreme Court on Thursday upheld a suspended jail sentence for Lotte Group chairman Shin Dong-bin for bribery in the massive influence-peddling scandal that led to the ouster of former President Park Geun-hye.

Shin was initially given a four-year suspended sentence in February 2018 for paying Park some W7 billion in bribes to win support for his duty-free business (US$1=W1,181).

The sentence was suspended on the assumption that Shin paid the bribes out of fear that his business could be affected negatively if he refused.

Later on Thursday, Lotte Group released a statement promising to become a trustworthy company that contributes to the nation and society.
description: Top Court Upholds Suspended Jail Term for Lotte Chief
